participant_1.background:
I'd brag to my friends about my delicious home grown vegetables.
i am a cat person.
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, because it helps me to stay positive and focused on raising my sons.
i like to create art.
I bought a book for myself and my cats to read together.

participant_2.background:
I work long hours to support my family.
I met the creators of my favorite comic book series at a comic con in Russia.
i have a collection of video games.
I want to show my siblings how to rollerblade.
I remember helping my mom bake cupcakes in the kitchen when I was a kid.

content.text: Hello, I'm so glad we got matched up! I love meeting new people and finding out about their interests. What do you like to do for fun?
Hello! I am a huge fan of comic books and video games. I love to go to conventions and meet other people who share my interests. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to create art and spend time with my cats. I also like to listen to upbeat and energetic music to help me stay positive.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to be able to draw. I can't wait to see some of your art. What kind of cats do you have?
I have two cats, a tabby named Mittens and a calico named Snowball. They are both very sweet and loving. I love spending time with them.
Aww, they sound adorable! I'm glad you have such great companions. I have a dog named Buddy, a golden retriever. He's my best friend.
I love golden retrievers! They are such gentle and loving dogs.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! I'm looking forward to getting to know you better.
Me too! I'm sure we'll be great friends.
